short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create Custom Fields in Google calendar™

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
▶ Using Custom Fields for Google Calendar™ add-on you can create and manage custom fields that doesn't exist in the regular Calendar interface.

▶ It supports a range of field types including Dropdown menus, Date Pickers, Color Pickers, Checkboxes, Multiple Choice options, and Long/Short Text entries.

▶ Role based access: Only users with edit access for the event are able to create or update the custom fields, while others will have view-only access, just like other standard fields.

▶ A simple user interface to manage the fields. Admin can quickly add or remove fields from an event.

Need Help ?
--------------------

Website: https://tabgraf.com

Release Notes
--------------------
03 Mar 2024 - Enhanced version with additional features released. Guests can now access and view the fields even without the add-on installed.
